front.title: •Expand The Empire
front.gametext: Deploy on any site. 'Expands' your 'game text' for that site to add to your 'game text' at the adjacent sites.
front.lore: The Emperor disbanded the Imperial Senate 'for the duration of the emergency,' seizing absolute power. He planned to extend rule by terrorizing planets into submission.

combo: Expand The Empire + Tatooine: Cantina + Tatooine: Lars' Moisture Farm + Tatooine: Jundland Wastes Deploy Expand The Empire at Tatooine: Lars' Moisture Farm, and it will add the gametext of that site to both adjacent sites. Now the Cantina is Force Drain +1 (making a total Force Drain of 3), and the Jundland Wastes are Force Drain +1 +1 (making a total Force Drain of 3). All this, and at all 3 sites you can add 1 to each of your weapon destiny draws.
rulings: Does not expand card titles, marker numbers, icons, or anything else besides game text.
Does not allow docking bay transit to occur to or from a non-docking bay site.
Two identical modifiers stack, for example 'Force drain +1 here. Force drain +1 here.' will work to add 2 to Force drains there.
While game text is canceled or suspended at one site, it is not expanded to adjacent sites.
Expanding the Tatooine: Podrace Arena game text to adjacent sites makes those sites non-battlegrounds while any race total > 0.
